website_summaries.verdict: A powerful antioxidant to boost your immune system and support bone and tissue health throughout the body.
pros: Vegan, raw, kosher, gluten-free, dairy-free, non-GMO
Raw vitamin C, with 23 fruit and vegetable extracts, including live probiotics and enzymes to promote gut health
cons: May cause constipation or upset stomach
Must take two pills daily to get full 500 milligrams of vitamin C, though that dosage may not be necessary

customer_reviews.title: Garden of Life just sold its soul to the devil ...
customer_reviews.text: Garden of Life just sold its soul to the devil -- NESTLE CORPORATION!!!!!! I have cancelled all subscriptions and will NEVER buy this brand again. How this quality company could align with the GMO devil is beyond me.
customer_reviews.author: SBOTTER

customer_reviews.title: Quality no longer assured.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the owner cashed out the Nessle so can't trust the quality anymore. Anyone know of productions that would be a good replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Constipation a definite problem with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Constipation a definite problem with this product. Additionally, vitamin C helps keep herpes based issues at bay, including chronic shingles. This Vitamin C had NO effect whatsoever. In other Garden of Life products I have used for some time, bloodwork is reflecting Vitamins they claim are in their product, but are showing up as LOW levels (below normal range) in blood work. These sorts of things started soon after Nestle took the reins. Hmmmmmm. Good opportunity to switch over to an organic fermented regimen, preferably from a small company.
customer_reviews.author: 50 Something

customer_reviews.title: Front of the box is deceiving--only 250 mg, not 500 mg.
customer_reviews.text: The box says on the front that it contains 500 mg of vit C, but you need to take TWO pills to get that amount. To me it is deceiving as one may think one pill is 500 mg. It gets to be quite expensive if you need like 3,000 mg daily.
customer_reviews.author: mitch2

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware: Monsanto owns this brand now
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a good company. It no longer is. I had a reaction from taking it and then learned this company was bought by Monsanto! They are NOT organic.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Pugliese

customer_reviews.title: WORKS  !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Diabetic Nerve Pain Relief !!! This really works in 2 tabs per day AM/PM. It simply boosts your immune system so much that diabetic nerve pain and numbness get better and eventually go away. I have used it consistantly for months and just want to help other diabetics feel better. I think the secret is in the vitamin C being RAW and unprocessed, and the dosage. Hope it does the same for you.
customer_reviews.author: JanisKay Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best quality available
customer_reviews.text: My local health foods store (decade ago) gave me a copy of the book written by one of the “Garden of Life” founders, Jordan Rubin. The science behind what they’ve developed is sound, based on my college experiences & subsequent studies. They managed to commercialize a process, bringing to market what I consider is the highest quality line of natural supplements I’ve found. My local store is going out business, can’t compete with online retailers. So I was grateful to find & subscribe to regular home shipments of this, the B complex, and their “50 & older men’s” probiotic formulas. I take them daily. Ain’t cheap, just solid value for top notch products.
customer_reviews.author: Pilgrim Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: New Formula?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for months (subscribe and save) and I just noticed that my latest shipment has a different formula. New formula has more vitamin C (500 mg vs 300) and has more raw organic fruit & veggie blend 720mg vs 20 mg. So it seems like a positive change but I saw no press releases or any other word from Garden of Life regarding the cange
customer_reviews.author: Martin Rozycki

customer_reviews.title: Feel Sick after taking one
customer_reviews.text: Took one and feel sick! Lethargic, bad Nausea, Dizzy. Must be allergic to something in the Blend. 30+ ingredients in the vitamin C pill. Never been allergic to anything I know of.
customer_reviews.author: Becky J.

customer_reviews.title: As other reviewers have stated, this may not be 100% natural vit C
customer_reviews.text: Please read the label carefully and do your research. The "raw" advertising got me, but after experiencing negative side effects such as severe constipation I looked at the labeling closely and discovered that while there is vitamin C 500mg, it doesn't say what type of vit c it is. Then, misleadingly underneath there is a "Raw Organic Fruit and Veg Blend of 720 mg I don't believe the vitamin c is from a natural source.
customer_reviews.author: Rumi

customer_reviews.title: great quality and immune support
customer_reviews.text: I can tell the difference between ascorbic acid and natural vit C. I am on chemotherapy and my white count is 2.5. I am very pleased with mucous membrane and immune effects when used with L-lysine. Recently the grand kids had running noses, all the adults caught this cold but me. I'm so glad I Take my L-lysine and vitamin C daily
customer_reviews.author: Katie1554

Took these and the next day which is today, I am feeling so much better. Have to keep these in stock.

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 trimmers did not work; Item is not eligible for return!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 trimmers for presents. 2 out of 3 did not work! Non-existent quality control. To make it worse, trimmers are "NOT eligible for a refund".
customer_reviews.author: Levap

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived damaged, bottom of glass was broke and pills spilled everywhere. Amazon made it right with a free replacement. Amazon customer service is 5 stars for sure. As for the product itself, have ordered from the brand many times and this specific product once. To be honest, it is a vitamin, so it is hard to speak to the efficacy because there is little way to prove that it "does" something. But, the ingredients are great and it doesn't make me feel "worse". So I can't really complain about the vitamin. As is usual with vitamins, you just hope it is somehow preventing future health conditions and that you are not wasting money on expensive pee.
customer_reviews.author: A.Bates546

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Grade of Vitamin C
customer_reviews.text: These are great, and seem to do a great job in shortening a cold. My husband starting feeling bad, and had a scratchy throat. Since he does not take thes regurly, I gave him a double dose for 3 days, and now he feels great.

I love that it’s natural vitamin C but the added probiotics made me sick. My system is too sensitive for it. I’m not sure why that was added but it doesn’t work for me.

Price is the only draw back here, other than that its seems to be a good product

product_meta.title: Garden of Life Vitamin C - Vitamin Code Raw Vitamin C - 120 Vegan Capsules, 500mg Whole Food Vitamin C with Bioflavonoids, Fruits & Veggies, Probiotics, Gluten Free Vitamin C Supplements for Adults
product_meta.description:
Size:120 Count (Pack of 1)While most people associate vitamin C with immune support, the truth is that this powerful antioxidant, found in every cell of the body, is more far-reaching than a simple immune support vitamin. Protecting your cells against the effects of free radical damage, vitamin C helps the body ward off the effects of oxidative stress. It is critical in helping to build and maintain tissues while strengthening the immune system.

BRAND STORY
By Garden of Life
feature_bullets: VITAMIN C: Essential for growth and tissue repair, C vitamin promotes vision health, periodontal health and collagen, bone and cartilage formation
BONE STRENGTH: This RAW, food created vitamin C provides heart health support, immune system support, bone support, skin health, eye health, and memory & concentration
PROBIOTICS AND ENZYMES: Our plant based b 12 vitamin includes a RAW probiotic and enzyme blend for digestive support and vegetable blend for additional nutritional support
VEGAN VITAMIN C: Our real food vegan C vitamin is RAW, Gluten Free, Dairy Free and non GMO with No Binders or Fillers

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
